testCases.description: Aggressive particle merging - particles always merge with preceding word
Short copula 'です' merges with preceding word
Particle 'が' merges, auxiliary 'た' merges, time word '時' separate
Object marker を merges with noun
Short adverbs treated as single words due to low segmenter threshold

notes: This configuration prioritizes navigation smoothness over precise word boundaries. Best for reading continuous text where you want fewer, larger jumps.
